external_games.name: TT Isle of Man 2 Ducati 900 - Mike Hailwood 1978

name: TT Isle of Man: Ride on the Edge 2 - Ducati 900: Mike Hailwood 1978
summary: Relive one of the greatest moments of the Isle of Man TT with Mike Hailwood and his famous Ducati 900. With 14 TT wins, Mike Hailwood is a legend of the race and still among the elite in total number of victories.
